Name: Delicious Apple Roly Poly
Desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.
Effect: After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore 20% HP and an extra 1,200 HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
